title: Missing Ward Skin
body: I was looking at ward skins today and just noticed I am missing the 2014 ward skin. I still have the corresponding champion skin reward  for that year, the skin just mysteriously disappeared one day. What do I do to fix that?

replies.body:
Sorry about that! We're aware of and are tracking an issue where specific ward skins are not selectable in champ select. I can't provide an exact date on when the fix will roll out, but our engineers are hard at work on finding one. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
Just an FYI.  They are not just missing from the champ select screen.  They are also missing from the store.

My lantern of the serpent ward was one of my faves :(
oh well ward of draven will have to do for now {{champion:119}}
and here I thought someone ate my ginger bread ward
